author: ate
msg: The StrutsPortlet now saves the original Struts URL as a request attribute (StrutsPortlet.ORIGIN_URL).
If this hasn't been set as portlet action parameter (yet) it is defaulted to the defaultPage portlet parameter.
The StrutsPortletURL.getOriginURL(HttpServletRequest) method now returns this request attribute instead of

author: markt
msg: Added shortcuts for Tc4.1.x and Tc3.3.x. Note that 3.3.x includes the latest version of the connectors.

author: kmarsden
msg: Client driver gets OutOfMemoryError when re-executing statement without closing ResultSet
